title: Elon Musk To Award $1 Million Each Day To A Signer Of His Petition
content: Elon Musk awarded a $1 million check to an attendee of his event in Pennsylvania aimed at rallying supporters behind Republican Donald Trump.
summary: Elon Musk awarded a $1 million check to an attendee of his event in Pennsylvania aimed at rallying supporters behind Republican Donald Trump.

title: Boss Fires Woman After She Comes Back From Maternity Leave Pregnant Again
content: Nikita Twitchen, a former admin assistant at First Grade Projects, launched an unfair dismissal claim, alleging her pregnancy was the reason for her termination.
summary: Nikita Twitchen, a former admin assistant at First Grade Projects, launched an unfair dismissal claim, alleging her pregnancy was the reason for her termination.

title: "Had Weird Taste": Woman Freed From ISIS Reveals They Made Them Eat Babies
content: Fawzia Sido recounted how, at the age of nine, she was captured along with her brothers and starved for three days. She was rescued by Israel from Gaza earlier this month.
summary: Fawzia Sido recounted how, at the age of nine, she was captured along with her brothers and starved for three days. She was rescued by Israel from Gaza earlier this month.

title: A Ukraine Drone Hovered Over Russian Troops. Then A Rocket Rained Fire
content: A drone this week helped Ukrainian troops attack a military training facility of Russian troops in Zaporizhzhia Oblast in Russian-occupied southern Ukraine.
summary: A drone this week helped Ukrainian troops attack a military training facility of Russian troops in Zaporizhzhia Oblast in Russian-occupied southern Ukraine.

title: Diwali At Times Square: Indians Mark Festival Of Lights Ahead Of US Polls
content: Celebrations sparkled up the Times Square in New York City yesterday as the Indian community and several US citizens gathered to observe the Hindu festival of lights.
summary: Celebrations sparkled up the Times Square in New York City yesterday as the Indian community and several US citizens gathered to observe the Hindu festival of lights.

title: 35% Pay Raise, $7,000 Signing Bonus: Boeing's Deal With Protesting Workers
content: Boeing workers began a strike on September 13 in a dispute over pay and other compensation issues.
summary: Boeing workers began a strike on September 13 in a dispute over pay and other compensation issues.

title: UK Man Bites Off Teen Girl's Face In Front Of Horrified Bus Passengers
content: A 19-year-old girl suffered a horrific attack on a bus when a stranger bit off part of her face, leaving her requiring 50 stitches.
summary: A 19-year-old girl suffered a horrific attack on a bus when a stranger bit off part of her face, leaving her requiring 50 stitches.

title: Musk Backs Paper Ballots For US Polls, Claims Voting Machines Rig Elections
content: Elon Musk, the owner of X, while speaking at a town hall in the swing state of Pennsylvania, claimed that voting machines rig elections, ABC News reported.
summary: Elon Musk, the owner of X, while speaking at a town hall in the swing state of Pennsylvania, claimed that voting machines rig elections, ABC News reported.

title: Hamas' Yahya Sinwar Seen Inside Tunnel Hours Before October 7 Attack
content: Israel released footage showing Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar moving his belongings to a tunnel in Gaza hours before the October 7 attack last year that triggered the ongoing war.
summary: Israel released footage showing Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar moving his belongings to a tunnel in Gaza hours before the October 7 attack last year that triggered the ongoing war.

title: Classified US Intelligence Leaked, Documents Show Israel's Plans For Iran
content: Two highly classified US intelligence documents have leaked, allegedly exposing Israel's military preparations for a potential strike on Iran, the New York Times reported.
summary: Two highly classified US intelligence documents have leaked, allegedly exposing Israel's military preparations for a potential strike on Iran, the New York Times reported.

title: Israel Hits Beirut, Gaza After "Assassination" Attempt On Netanyahu
content: Israel on Saturday said it hit Iran-backed group Hezbollah's arms facilities in Beirut and "Hamas terror target" in Gaza after a drone was launched towards Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's residence.
summary: Israel on Saturday said it hit Iran-backed group Hezbollah's arms facilities in Beirut and "Hamas terror target" in Gaza after a drone was launched towards Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's residence.

title: Lost Ghost Story By 'Dracula' Author Bram Stoker Discovered In Dublin
content: A short story by Bram Stoker, the legendary author of "Dracula", has been unearthed by a lifelong enthusiast in Dublin who stumbled upon the work while browsing in a library archive.
summary: A short story by Bram Stoker, the legendary author of "Dracula", has been unearthed by a lifelong enthusiast in Dublin who stumbled upon the work while browsing in a library archive.

title: Power Outage In Cuba As Electrical Grid Collapses For 2nd Time Within Hours
content: Cuba's electrical grid collapsed again early on Saturday morning, state-run media reported, plunging the entire country into blackout for a second time just hours after authorities announced they had begun reestablishing service.
summary: Cuba's electrical grid collapsed again early on Saturday morning, state-run media reported, plunging the entire country into blackout for a second time just hours after authorities announced they had begun reestablishing service.

title: Israel Drops Leaflets Over Gaza Showing Yahya Sinwar's Body
content: Israeli planes dropped leaflets over southern Gaza on Saturday showing a picture of the dead Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar with the message that "Hamas will no longer rule Gaza", echoing language used by Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
summary: Israeli planes dropped leaflets over southern Gaza on Saturday showing a picture of the dead Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar with the message that "Hamas will no longer rule Gaza", echoing language used by Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

title: China Consulate In Myanmar Hit With Explosive Device: Report
content: China's consulate in Myanmar's city of Mandalay was attacked with an explosive device, local media said Saturday, adding that no deaths or injuries were reported.
summary: China's consulate in Myanmar's city of Mandalay was attacked with an explosive device, local media said Saturday, adding that no deaths or injuries were reported.

title: In Pics: 'Zombies' Swarm Japanese Train In 'Train To Busan' Tribute
content: It's usually a serene two-and-a-half-hour ride on Japan's famously efficient bullet train. But the journey quickly descended into a zombie apocalypse, with passengers screaming in terror.
summary: It's usually a serene two-and-a-half-hour ride on Japan's famously efficient bullet train. But the journey quickly descended into a zombie apocalypse, with passengers screaming in terror.

title: "Thank you For Changing My Life": Liam Payne's Sister Shares Heartfelt Post
content: The sister of One Direction member Liam Payne shared a heartfelt message to him on Saturday, in the latest poignant tribute from around the world following his death earlier this week.
summary: The sister of One Direction member Liam Payne shared a heartfelt message to him on Saturday, in the latest poignant tribute from around the world following his death earlier this week.

title: Gaza Says 2 Patients Died During Israeli Siege On Hospital
content: Gaza's health ministry said two patients at a hospital in the territory's north died during a siege by Israeli forces around the facility on Saturday, while Israel's military reported its troops were operating in the area.
summary: Gaza's health ministry said two patients at a hospital in the territory's north died during a siege by Israeli forces around the facility on Saturday, while Israel's military reported its troops were operating in the area.

title: "Grave Mistake": Netanyahu On Hezbollah's "Assassination" Attempt
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has warned Hezbollah that its alleged attempt to assassinate him and his wife was a "grave mistake" and anybody who tries to harm Israel's citizens would pay a "heavy price".
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has warned Hezbollah that its alleged attempt to assassinate him and his wife was a "grave mistake" and anybody who tries to harm Israel's citizens would pay a "heavy price".

title: Xi Jinping Asks Troops To Prepare For War As Drills Intensify Around Taiwan
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping called this week for troops to strengthen their preparedness for war, state media reported today, just days after Beijing staged large-scale military drills around Taiwan.
summary: Chinese President Xi Jinping called this week for troops to strengthen their preparedness for war, state media reported today, just days after Beijing staged large-scale military drills around Taiwan.
